thread.section_title: Nengun Performance評価／レビュー | お客様は Nengun Performanceの評価／レビューをしました。 | nengun.com
thread.title: Marc
thread.title_full: Nengun Performance について 投稿者 Marc

author: Marc
title: Marc
text: Offered items at a great price. Shipping was done in a timely fashion because I purchased from the US. Took around 3 weeks to have my parts at ny door. Communication was good also, kept me updated with emails. There is a point reward system, make sure you make an account before purchasing. It was not physically possible for them to add my purchase to the account I created after ordering.
